list.abs: I ' d like a specious room ., 我要一间装饰漂亮的房间.
什么意思... ... specious present 似现在 lagerstroemia specious 大叶紫薇 specious arguments 似是而非的论点.
Whatever specious arguments would silence an opponent ., 无论什么似是而非的论点都会使对手哑口无言.
Let us not be misled by such specious arguments ., 我们不要被这样似是而非的论点所迷惑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense, beautiful,): from Latin speciosus 'fair', from species (see species)

entry.tran: 似是而非的;貌似真实的
entry.def: Something that is specious seems to exist or be true, but is not real or true.

example.ex: It is unlikely that the Duke was convinced by such specious arguments.
example.tran: 公爵不太可能相信这种似是而非的论点。

sentences.sentence: "the spurious inferences from obsolescent notions of causality"- Ethel Albert
"the gilded and perfumed but inwardly rotten nobility"

auth_sentence.content: This is what is known as a SPECIOUS argument.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is what is known as a SPECIOUS argument.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is what is known as a SPECIOUS argument.

auth_sentence.content: His entire "Copernican Principle" argument is specious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His entire "Copernican Principle" argument is specious.

auth_sentence.content: I merely take issue with your demonstrably specious logic.
auth_sentence.res_content: I merely take issue with your demonstrably specious logic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I merely take issue with your demonstrably specious logic.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单
